text:
The problem is illustrated in the following ant script:

<target name="test-zip" depends="set-properties">
	<zip destfile="myzip.zip">
		<fileset dir="BUILD/classes">
			<include name="**/batch/**/*.class"/>
		</fileset>
	</zip>
	<zip destfile="myzip.zip" update="true">
		<fileset dir="BUILD/classes">
			<include name="**/bo/**/*.class"/>
		</fileset>
	</zip>
</target>

Essentially I want to create a zip file in my build, and later on update it 
with classes from another package. The update doesn't happen. Naturally I've 
checked that the classes are present. The first zip succeeds, the second with 
the update doesn't. How does it fail - well it states absolutely nothing, and 
doesn't add the files.

I'm curious as to what's causing this, since zip/jar update worked in 1.5 Beta 
3.
creator: vandlaasen@hotmail.com
bodewig@apache.org
